segments.text: I see water everywhere, it's such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even seem to care about the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's so careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being sneaky, trying to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and it's going to be a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like yelling at them to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still running, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, but in here it's a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching this anymore.
segments.speaker: PAR
